attributes.action: We want the government help the people in palestine instead of supporting Israel
attributes.background:
We want the government to help the people in Palestine.
To help Palestine in the war instead of Israel as of all the destruction Israel has caused to the poor citizens of Palestine.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: 

Withdraw support for Israel and support Palestine in Israel-Palestine conflict: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648456
